Features/Skills

Feats: Deadly Aim; Elemental Focus (Electricity); Expanded Arcana; Lightning Reflexes; Quicken Spell; Reach Spell; Shield Focus; Skill Focus (Craft (Traps)); Skill Focus (Knowledge (Geography)); Skill Focus (Knowledge (Planes)); Strike Back Traits: Adopted; Reactionary Human Features: Bonus Feat; Human Ability Adjustment; Skilled Ranger Features: Armor Proficiency (Medium); Camouflage; Cleave; Combat Style (Two-Handed Weapon); Endurance; Favored Terrain; Furious Focus; Great Cleave; Guide; Hide In Plain Sight; Improved Ranger's Luck; Improved Sunder; Inspired Moment; Ranger's Focus; Ranger's Luck; Shield Of Swings; Shield Proficiency; Swift Tracker; Terrain Bond; Track; Weapon Proficiency (Martial); Wild Empathy; Woodland Stride
Feature Notes:
Bonus Feat: +1 General Feat
Adopted: Has one trait from adoptive family's race
Inspired Moment: Self gains +10' Speed, extra move, +4 AC and attack, +4 ability and skill checks, and confirm crit for 1 rd 2/dy
Woodland Stride: May move normally through undergrowth
Skills (180 ranks, max 20 each):
Acrobatics: (dex;cc) 2 (+3) Heal: (wis) 10 (+16) Ride: (dex) 20 (+24)
Climb: (str) 20 (+23) Knowledge (Geography): (int) 2 (+10) Spellcraft: (int) 20 (+25)
Craft (Traps): (int) 20 (+31) Knowledge (Planes): (int;cc) 1 (+6) Stealth: (dex) 10 (+14)
Diplomacy: (cha;cc) 10 (+13) Perception: (wis) 9 (+15) Survival: (wis) 2 (+8)
Disguise: (cha;cc) 10 (+13) Perform (Comedy): (cha;cc) 2 (+5) Swim: (str) 20 (+23)
Handle Animal: (cha) 20 (+26) Profession (Librarian): (wis) 2 (+8)
Languages: Celestial; Common; Halfling
Skill Notes:
Armor Skill Check Penalty: -1 Dex- and Str-based skills
Intelligence Language Adjustment: +2
Intelligence Skill Ranks Adjustment: +40
Skill Focus (Craft (Traps)): +6 Craft (Traps)
Skill Focus (Knowledge (Geography)): +3 Knowledge (Geography)
Skill Focus (Knowledge (Planes)): +3 Knowledge (Planes)
Skilled: +20 Skill ranks
Camouflage: May use Stealth to hide in favored terrain
Favored Terrain: +2 or more Knowledge (Geography), Perception, Stealth, and Survival and leaves no trail in 4 terrain type(s)
Hide In Plain Sight: May hide even when observed
Swift Tracker: May track at full speed
Terrain Bond: Allies w/in sight and hearing gain +2 Perception, Stealth, and Survival and leave no trail in favored terrain
Track: +10 Survival to follow creatures' trail
Wild Empathy: +23 Diplomacy (animals)
Combat
Hit Points: 126 Initiative: +4 Armor Class: 16 Attacks Per Round: 4 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +20/+21/+22 Combat Maneuver Bonus/Defense: +21/33
Armor Proficiency: Medium Shield Proficiency: Heavy Weapon Proficiency: Martial
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Greatsword (+21 2d6+1 x2@19); Lance (+21 d8+1 x3@20); Ranseur (+21 2d4+1 x3@20); Unarmed (+21 d3+1 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Improved Ranger's Luck: Increased Ranger's Luck effects
Reactionary: +2 Initiative
Shield Focus: +1 AC
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Cleave: May suffer -2 AC to gain attack against two foes
Deadly Aim: May suffer -6 ranged attack to gain +12 damage
Favored Terrain: +2 or more Initiative in 4 terrain type(s)
Furious Focus: Suffers no penalty on first attack using two-handed Power Attack
Great Cleave: May cleave w/out limit
Improved Sunder: Sunder provokes no AOO, gains +2 Sunder check and CMD
Ranger's Focus: +10 attack and damage vs. target until surrenders or reduced to 0 or negative HP 7/dy
Ranger's Luck: May gain +4 reroll attack or force foe -4 reroll 3/dy
Shield Of Swings: May reduce two-handed weapon full-attack action damage by half to gain +4 AC and CMD
Strike Back: May ready melee attack against melee foes that are out of range
Terrain Bond: Allies w/in sight and hearing gain +2 Initiative in favored terrain
Save: Fortitude: +13; Reflex: +16; Will: +9
Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +2
Lightning Reflexes: +2 Reflex
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +3
Endurance: +4 extended physical action
Magic
Spell Slots: R1: 5; R2: 5; R3: 4; R4: 3 Spell DC: R: 13
Magic Notes:
Wisdom Ranger Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level R1, R2, R3
Elemental Focus (Electricity): +1 save DC on spells that inflict electricity damage
Expanded Arcana: +1 spells known, or +2 of lower than max level
Quicken Spell: May use +4 spell slot to cast chosen spell as a free action 1/rd
Reach Spell: May cast touch, close, or medium range spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
